name: Anitha Noone
my_business:
We do centralised air conditioning projects and VRF Projects in Hyderabad, Bangalore, and Chennai. We deal with Carrier, Midea, Mitsubishi, Daikin, Voltas and Bluestar. We do projects with water-cooled and Air-cooled chillers, Ductable units, VRF/VRV, DX, cassettes and High-wall units.
Kitchen Ventilation, Basement Ventilation Projects, Ducting and Insulation works.

my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story is about a vendor I had been working with for years long before BNI. One day, during a training, I was surprised to see him walk in as a member of another chapter! What was once just a business connection suddenly became a strong BNI collaboration with trust, systems, and a shared network behind it. That’s when I realised how beautifully BNI connects professionals who are already aligned in values and work ethics.

name: Arjun Singh
my_business:
We are a 1 stop solution for all construction needs. We specialise in villas, apartments and individual homes. We also create great weekend homes and resorts. Our area of expertise is broken into 2 main verticals:
1. Construction services for building all types of homes. Right from a 1000 sft. small home to 50000+ sft. can be taken up by us.  Whether it is an individual home or construction of flats, we are the best fit partners for this. Quality and realistic timelines drive our work. Aesthetics, practicality and beautiful designs is what we specialise in. 
2. Real estate investment management for our clients looking to invest in our apartment, villa or land projects for development is also a main area of our expertise. We help in identification, legal verification, registration and development of properties to help grow our clients’ investments giving 1.5x to 4x return on investments.
ideal_referral: New Home Seekers/Buyers Investment at Low Ticket Values
top_problem_solved: Quality at great affordable Prices 2-3X Growth on Investment New Growth Corridor Entry for Home buyers
my_favourite_bni_story: BNI, offers opportunities of networking beyond the weekly meeting. BNI Cricket is one such platform that I’ve greatly benefited from. I have met some of my closest collaborators and investors on the cricket field. We have together, built large project, portfolio and opportunities of business and financial growth for each other.

name: Jairam Khairajani
top_product: Turnkey Interior Design Solutions — from concept to completion. We handle everything from space planning, design development, material selection, site execution, and handover , ensuring the entire process is smooth, coordinated, and thoughtfully designed.
ideal_referral: 1. Builders 2. Business owners 3. Home owners 4. Café, salon, and boutique owners setting up their first or next outlet 5. Young professionals or families moving into a new apartment 6. Startups or corporate offices wanting functional, branded spaces 7. Individual Looking To Renovate Office/Residential Spaces.
top_problem_solved: Clients often struggle with uncoordinated execution, unclear budgets, and design mismatches between concept and final outcome. We solve this by offering end-to-end turnkey interiors where design, planning, and execution stay under one roof, ensuring clarity, quality, and on-time delivery.
my_favourite_bni_story: Was when a simple intro turned into a project, the client hugged us at handover, and said “you made my space feel like me.” That’s when I realised BNI doesn’t just give business — it gives impact.

name: Pushpank Kaushik
top_product: **Services Offered by Jassper Shipping** 1. **Ship Broking** - Vessel chartering (dry bulk, liquid bulk, and breakbulk) - Spot and long-term charters - Post-fixture operations support 2. **Freight Forwarding** - Multimodal transportation (air, sea, and road) - Full-container load (FCL) and less-than-container load (LCL) services - Customs clearance and documentation - Warehousing and distribution solutions 3. **Project Logistics** - End-to-end logistics for oversized and heavy-lift cargo - Route surveys and feasibility studies - Specialized equipment and vessel chartering for unique projects 4. **Port and Terminal Services** - Stevedoring and cargo handling - Vessel agency services - Port clearance and documentation 5. **Supply Chain Solutions** - Integrated supply chain management - Inventory optimization and demand planning - 3PL and 4PL solutions 6. **Specialized Cargo Handling** - Reefer cargo logistics (temperature-controlled transportation) - Dangerous goods (DG) transportation and compliance - Breakbulk and roll-on/roll-off (RoRo) services 7. **Consulting and Advisory Services** - Maritime legal advisory - Market intelligence and feasibility analysis - Risk management and compliance consulting 8. **Sustainability Solutions** - Carbon footprint analysis for supply chain activities - Eco-friendly transportation alternatives - Sustainable logistics planning and execution By offering comprehensive services across the logistics and shipping spectrum, Jassper Shipping ensures seamless, efficient, and innovative solutions for clients worldwide.
top_problem_solved: Every challenge opens up a new door for us as an organisation.
